Title: Microglia Tweak Retinogeniculate Pathways during Visual Circuit Refinement
Abstract: © 2020 Elsevier Inc.Cheadle et al. reveal that microglia expressing TWEAK facilitate synapse elimination through a novel, non-phagocytic mechanism in the retinogeniculate pathway during visual circuit development.
